desc: This project is for a new NGO being launched in December.We are looking for a talented video producer to create the official launch video.Supply chains around the world are the arteries of global commerce, enabling trade flows worth tens of trillions annually in merchandise and services trade alone.These complex ecosystems engage the smallest micro-enterprise to the largest multinational.They often involve or depend on the contributions of international institutions and governments around the world, and are the source of large investment flows and economic value-creation around the globe.The NGO aims to set the global standard for certification of individuals and institutions in the professional practice of trade-related disciplines, strengthening the health, sustainability and management of supply chains through competency and expertise, benefitting global buyers, their MSME supplier communities and the ecosystem of service providers and others that support supply chains reaching around the globe.The NGO aims to raise the ethical standard for trade and trade professionals by raising awareness of global best practice.The NGO would like to hire an individual who can take the key objectives of the video and develop the storyboard, video and music and voice overs for two short videos: (1) to promote the concept of the NGO and to provide a call to action for the various stakeholders to get involved; and (2) to directly promote the NGO and initiative with a direct call to action for individuals to become involved.If you are interested in this job please submit a short resume but most importantly please submit an example of previous videos you have created for a similar product launch, campaign launch or company launch.Budgets for this project will range between $5-10K but will be negotiated with the successful applicant depending on the quality of the work.
title: Video producer for two launch videos

desc: 3D Generalist, Freelance, Screen Scene VFX – Dublin, Ireland.Screen Scene are looking for a 3D generalist to join the team as a freelance member in the VFX department.Requirements•	Ability to work on a broad range of VFX tasks including modelling, texturing, look development, animation and lighting.•	Ability to use 3ds Max software•	An understanding of composition, light and colour•	The ability to work within a VFX pipeline using Shotgun software•	A European PassportSkills•	Excellent communication skills•	Good personal skills•	The ability to lead and work within a tight team•	Take direction well•	Good awareness of schedule and deadlinesCandidates should submit their CV/Resume, reel link and any other relevant information for consideration.To apply please reference ‘3D Generalist’ in the subject line to lmurphy@[url removed, login to view]Company summaryCelebrating over 25 years in the industry, Screen Scene offers a full service of post-production to our clients. Located in the heart of Dublin, the company grew from initially 3 people in 2 rooms to where we are now with over 65 full time broadcast professionals, editors, colourists, visual fx people, sound editors, and dubbing mixers.Our VFX department houses 32 artists along with a production team. We have worked on an extensive amount of TV shows and feature films, creating award winning VFX. In 2015, Screen Scene were nominated for a BAFTA for Special, Visual and Graphic Effects for their work on Whitechapel Terminus. Screen Scene was nominated for Outstanding Supporting Visual Effects in the 2015 VES Awards for the work completed on Ripper Street. In 2017, Screen Scene were also nominated for three Best Visual Effects awards; Black Sails, Ripper Street and Game of Thrones, at the Irish Film and Television awards. We are one of 20 venders who are currently working on Game of Thrones Season 7, which is set to air in July 2017.Screen Scene is the leading VFX house in Ireland, and is located in the heart of the city. Only 10mins walking distance away from the main shopping street, where you will find a buzzing night life with many restaurants and clubs to avail of.We look forward to hearing from you!
title: Hire a 3D Animator
